name: Star Hero
description: Star Hero is a survival space shooter where you play as a lone space pilot out in the depths of uncharted territory. Your goal is to survive as long as possible while enemy space freighters attempt to track and destroy you. Be aware as the longer you survive in deep space the more difficult the game becomes. You have photon cannons as your main source of offence against the invaders. use this weapon and star ship movement to your advantage to keep yourself alive, Good luck and have Fun!
